author: Friday Faves are for Sweet Licks – foodiecrush | Foodan
title: Comment on 18 Ways The Mall Saved Your Teenage Years, As Told By GIFs by Friday Faves are for Sweet Licks – foodiecrush | Foodan
text:
Dinner and a movie all under one roof! You Walked Around Aimlessly For Hours And Tried On Clothes You Couldn’t Afford 
Or you’d see if you could steal them just to spice things up! You Went To Bath And Body Works And Tried On All The Spritzes 
Cucumber Melon 4 life. Everything else is sub-par. The Mall Told You Everything You Needed To Know About Being Popular 
All the coolest music was at the FYE. You Got Your First Part-Time Job At The Mall, Which Meant Having Your Own Money! The Simpsons: The Complete Sixth Season 
But by the time your parents stopped giving you gas money because you had a job now, things got a bit too real. After Working At The Mall You Started To Get Sick of The Place And The Idiots Who Shop There 
IF I HAVE TO HEAR THAT FUCKING “ALL I WANT FOR CHRISTMAS IS YOU” MARIAH CAREY SONG ONE. MORE. TIME. All The Cute Boys You Liked Worked At The Mall And You Would Pop By Their Work
